name: Parmesan Spinach Balls
author: tish
summary: These delicious little appetizers are always a hit. Serve warm or at room temperature with a good quality mustard. These can be frozen unbaked and popped into the oven when unexpected guests pop in.
ingredients: 2 (10 ounce) packages frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a medium bowl, mix the frozen chopped spinach, Italian-style seasoned bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese, butter, green onion, eggs, salt and pepper
Shape the mixture into 1 inch balls
Arrange the balls in a single layer on a large baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven 10 to 15 minutes, until lightly browned
